name: EMPTY (thePotatoLizerd)
description:
You were once a mighty god, but one day you "accidentally" wiped out an entire kingdom of humans. As punishment, you were sent to a realm in between realms called the Empty. But this vast, empty dimension isn't meant to contain you.

It's meant to kill you. 

EMPTY is a short speedrunning game where the only goal is to reach the end as quickly as possible.  Avoid spikes and pits.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Shift to dash. Space to jump. Use ESC to exit the game, and R to restart the level.

(Warning: There's a lot of glitches. If you encounter one, report it to me, and restart the level :D )

Programming - thePotatoLizerd

Art - thePotatoLizerd

Sfx - nobody :(

Ideas - FireEyes and radzo73
